actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Planning and Community Right-To-Know Act of 1986 to cover Federal facilities.
short_title: Federal Facilities Community Right-To-Know Act of 1999
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Federal Facilities Community Right-To-Know Act of 1999 - Amends the Emergency Planning and Community Right-To-Know Act of 1986 to include the United States in the definition of "person" under such Act (thus providing for coverage of Federal facilities).

titles.title: Federal Facilities Community Right-To-Know Act of 1999
A bill to amend the Emergency Planning and Community Right-To-Know Act of 1986 to cover Federal facilities.
